imdb.title: RideBack
imdb.plot: Rin Yugata, a dancer, attends college after quitting ballet after an injury prevents her from performing in a play.

episodes.title: Shinku no tetsuma
episodes.plot: Ex-ballerina Rin's first experience aboard a RideBack turns into a nightmare when the malfunctioning machine races toward a cliff - but instead of suffering a fatal accident, Rin feels alive like never before.

episodes.title: Tamayo jôtô!? S.L.F: Supureddo reggusu fômu
episodes.plot: Rin is challenged to a race by the leader of the RideBack Club, Tamayo. She's tough, she's outspoken, and she's also the nation's top rider. If Rin can hold her own, Tamayo just might take her under her wing.

episodes.title: Soshite furaggu wa furareru
episodes.plot: The national tournament arrives. Tamayo's set to defend her title, and Rin's racing, too - but with Fuego ineligible, she's forced to mount an unfamiliar RideBack.

episodes.title: Shôko, kiki ippatsu
episodes.plot: Shoko is caught in the middle of a terrorist attack, and Rin rushes into the chaos atop Fuego. Her daring rescue attempt appears doomed when she's cornered by armed soldiers - until a mysterious savior appears.

episodes.title: Nazo no raidobakku shôjo
episodes.plot: The media and the authorities alike are searching for the mysterious girl who penetrated the GGP blockade. The RideBack Club decides to lay low - but they've already caught the attention of several prying eyes.

episodes.title: Denkô sekka raido
episodes.plot: A RideBack gang is on a crime spree, targeting police and civilians alike. When Rin learns that her brother is among the thugs, it's bad enough. When she sees the action taken by the government against the group, it gets even worse.

episodes.title: Tsumi to x
episodes.plot: Rin is in custody, set to be handed over to the GGP. Overwhelmed by feelings of guilt, she wants no part of the conspiracy in which she is caught - but the BMA soon forces her deeper into the fray.

episodes.title: Get ride! Ebareshi mono
episodes.plot: Kiefer helps Rin understand the connection she shares with Fuego. Later, after the BMA compound comes under attack by the GGP, Kiefer's intentions become crystal clear to Romanov.

episodes.title: Hidamari no niwa de
episodes.plot: Romanov is tightening the screws on the entire nation, confiscating RideBacks and preparing to crush any opposition. Meanwhile, Rin and Tamayo remain in hiding, causing their friends to grow concerned for their safety.

episodes.title: Master of the War
episodes.plot: Citizens gather to protest the GGP, but mayhem erupts when the White Riders arrive. When the situation spirals out of control, Suzuri pays a grave price when she's mistaken for the mysterious Rideback Girl.

episodes.title: Kumori nochi hare toki doki...
episodes.plot: Kiefer's troops begin their assault on GGP. Meanwhile, as the BMA base is infiltrated by autonomous RideBacks, Rin reflects on recent events - and decides she must take action!

episodes.title: Hikari no daichi e
episodes.plot: As allies and adversaries fight to the death, Rin climbs aboard Fuego for the performance of her lifetime, a breathtaking dance of destruction against the forces of the GGP.
